Package ut.twente.notebridge.routes

Class MessageRoute

java.lang.Object
ut.twente.notebridge.routes.MessageRoute
@Path("/message") public class MessageRoute extends Object
This class is used to handle the message routes.

  • Method Details

    • getContacts

      @GET @Path("/contact/{id}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getContacts(@QueryParam("sortBy") String sortBy, @QueryParam("pageSize") int pageSize, @QueryParam("pageNumber") int pageNumber, @PathParam("id") String id)
      This method is used to get all contacts of a user.
      Parameters:
      sortBy - The field to sort by
      pageSize - The page size
      pageNumber - The page number
      id - The id of the user
      Returns:
      The response with the contacts

    • newMessageHistory

      @POST @Path("/newhistory/{user1}/{user2}") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response newMessageHistory(@PathParam("user1") String user1, @PathParam("user2") String user2)
      This method is used to create a message history between two users.
      Returns:
      The response with the message history

    • addMessage

      @POST @Path("/newmessage/{user}/{contact}/{message}") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response addMessage(@PathParam("user") String user, @PathParam("contact") String contact, @PathParam("message") String message)
      This method is used to add a message to a message history.
      Returns:
      The response with the added message

    • deleteMessageHistory

      This method is used to delete a message history.
      Returns:
      The response with the result

    • deleteMessage

      @DELETE @Path("/deletemessage/{user_id}/{timestamp}/{content}") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response deleteMessage(@PathParam("user_id") int id, @PathParam("timestamp") String timestamp, @PathParam("content") String content)
      This method is used to delete a message.
      Returns:
      The response with the result

    • readMessages

      @PUT @Path("/readmessages/{id}") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response readMessages(@PathParam("id") int id)
      This method is used to read messages. isRead field in message is set to true.
      Returns:
      The response with the result

    • countUnreadMessages

      @GET @Path("/count/{user}/{contact}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response countUnreadMessages(@PathParam("user") int user, @PathParam("contact") int contact)
      This method is used to return the number of unread messages.
      Returns:
      The response with the number of unread messages

    • getMessages

      @GET @Produces("application/json") @Path("/messages/{user1}/{user2}") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getMessages(@QueryParam("sortBy") String sortBy, @QueryParam("pageSize") int pageSize, @QueryParam("pageNumber") int pageNumber, @PathParam("user1") String user1, @PathParam("user2") String user2)
      This method is used to get all messages between two users.
      Returns:
      The response with the messages
